hobbies.name: Gym
hobbies.description: I love working out and going to the gym, it is the one place where I can truly focus on myself and let go of all my worries.

hobbies.name: Gaming
hobbies.description: Gaming is a great way for me to unwind and connect with long-distance friends. I enjoy playing a variety of games, mostly FIFA and FPS games.

hobbies.name: Going to the movies
hobbies.description: This is one of my most recent hobbies, I love watching a good movie (sometimes even not so good ones) and enjoying the experience of being in a cinema.
